title: teamsherry
author: teamsherry
content: In a digital age where everybody want to stay connected and updated ahead of everyone we tend to loss ourself in the media. The problem of being online always slowly start to creep up in our lives and with time it engulfs us, from official mails, IG, Facebook, TikTok for content, digital media has in all its power consume our lives. The constant obsession with mobile phone, ipad and Laptop has practically taken away our lives. Trauma can come from the form of childhood incident, relationship problems and disagreements at work and so on but as long as we do not detached ourselves from the cell, We cannot heal or move on. Be careful and patience out there happy Christmas in advance

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: It is important to be aware that the digital media is not only a place that has so many negativities in it but also can be used as a valuable tool to shape ourselves into what we want to become. For every innovation in this digital age, most especially in the social aspect, there is always an advantage and disadvantages to it. If you want ti settle for any of them, it is very easy to do. Let it be noteworthy that we play an important role into shaping our future destiny, we shouldn’t always blame the digital age but rather the family, society and our inner esteem.

comments.author: Justbillywitt
comments.body: It really depends what you are using the social media for. Only those who hasn't really discovered that the social media or digital innovation can be used for their own advantages keeps wasting their time. Others are using the digital innovation to make money while others are spending money on it. There is nothing wrong if you are being online steady provided you are earning from it. Like the online influencers and content creators. Some of us spend lot of time here in the form which is also adding positively to our lives because we are earning from here. In nutshell whatever you are doing with the Media innovation make sure it's impacting on you positively.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: The social media rave is not bad for our system and life. It is an upliftment to the world and we have to follow it but not just that way, not the negative ways that it presents to us but the positive ways. We have to look at the positive that comes from social media like the opportunities that it presents, the jobs opportunities that it creates, the entertainment and information. However, we just have to guide the younger people against the social media negatives, the pornography and all the corrupt tendencies that comes from it, underaged need to be protected.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Op I understand wattin you dey try talk oo, now adays our children dem wey dey grow don dey too use the social media carelessly, instead of Dem to read Dem go dey Facebook or TikTok from when Dem come back for school to night, den you go come dey see sa na for morning Dem go come dey rush dey do their assignment. If to say na so we carry the social for head when we dey their age, I no sure say many of us for graduate with good result, or get hope for beta future. As the social media fit teach us bad things na so e still dey teach us good things, I remember that year wey I wan write waec, na for Facebook I been take dey get some links and learn some kind solving Dem for maths and physics. And now the forum na still social media wey we take dey get am clear small small, so only this one alone dey show say the  internet space na very wonderful environment, but if to say many of us fit serious for this forum the way we serious for other social media er for don goo far.

People are making money from social, and promoting their business in social media.social has always been a very good medium in which people spread information to the world. I don't blame social media I blame people who use for the negative things ,people are the one controlling social media and using it the way they want, people use social  media for good and people also use it for bad.  Should we also blame people using it for good?
